line_1: With the king's shoulder knot and gay cockade,
line_2: Then grace the boney phantom in their stead
A mottled ensign of his harmless trade,

line_1: Views the long sword and fierce cockade.
Mark well his feather'd hat, his gilt cockade,
line_2: Rich rings, white hand, and coat of stiff brocade;

line_1: The martial air, the gay cockade,
line_2: Hence oft', to win some stubborn maid,
